privacy_policy.thank_you: Thank you for visiting www.recta.website (the "Website"). We respect your privacy, and this Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, and protect the information you provide to us.
privacy_policy.how_we_use_information: The information collected is used solely for the purpose of contacting you regarding your specific request or inquiry. We will not use your information for marketing purposes unrelated to your original request.
privacy_policy.data_retention: We will retain your information only for as long as necessary to fulfill the purpose for which it was collected. Afterward, your data will be securely deleted.
privacy_policy.information_security: We take appropriate measures to protect your personal information from unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.
privacy_policy.no_sharing_or_selling: We do not share your personal information with third parties, and we will not sell or disclose your information to other companies for any purpose.

Correct any inaccuracies in your personal information.
Request Deletion of your personal information.

privacy_policy.contact_information: To exercise these rights, please contact us at info@recta.website.
privacy_policy.changes_to_policy: We reserve the right to update this Privacy Policy at any time. Any changes will be effective immediately upon posting on this page.
